alert.note: Alert for Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 07 at 12:43AM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Alachua, northeastern Marion and southeastern Putnam Counties through 130 AM EDT... At 1243 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fort McCoy, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Crescent City, Pomona Park, Fort McCoy, Salt Springs, Juniper Springs, Citra, Lynne, Lake Delancy, Sparr and Anthony. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Marion; Eastern Alachua; Eastern Marion; Eastern Putnam; Western Marion; Western Putnam
